title: Utawarerumono OVA
synopsis: A three part OVA of Utawarerumono. The animation work will be done by the same staff that did the opening of the game the show was based on. The story will cover parts that weren't shown in the anime series.
voices: ['Tanaka, Atsuko', 'Miyake, Kaya', 'Yuzuki, Ryouka', 'Koyama, Rikiya', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Ohara, Sayaka', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Kirii, Daisuke', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Shimoyama, Yoshimitsu']
staff: [['Iwasa, Gaku', ['Producer']], ['Chung, Jin Ho', ['Producer']], ['Katsura, Kenichiro', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Hamano, Takatoshi', ['Sound Director']]]
